title: How to Get to the Canyon in Need for Speed: Carbon

steps.headline: Go to the location shown in map with the help of GPS (In free roam).
Reach to the bus stop with high wall (Bus stop are on both sides) and reset your car before touching bus stop boundary with car so that your car can slide in bus stop without break the bus stop.
steps.description: Park your car as shown in picture and wait for a rival challenge. If you don't get a rival challenge, go back to safe house and come back in free roam mode.

steps.headline: When you get challenged, accept it and select any position on map to drive.
steps.description: This will slide and re-appear your car on other side of  the wall.

steps.headline: Change your mode to free roam and drive to right carefully to road slowly watching that your car slides downward in dark area.
steps.description: (you can see video for the hint)

steps.headline: Soon you will be driving your car out of your map.
steps.description: Driving underneath the city just follow the moon for direction also check map for directions

steps.headline: Reach the destination marked in the picture.
Keep driving and you will soon see a road of canyon on your mini map.
Keep driving above the road and eventually you will fall down somewhere on the road.
steps.description: (While driving above the road in air, avoid slowing down your speed during this or you might get stuck in air. If you get stuck, try changing direction and or try reverse driving to come back in speed).

steps.headline: Now you will be on the Canyon, which is not showing in the territory maps.

text: Go to the location shown in map with the help of GPS (In free roam).  Reach to the bus stop with high wall (Bus stop are on both sides) and reset your car before touching bus stop boundary with car so that your car can slide in bus stop without break the bus stop. Park your car as shown in picture and wait for a rival challenge. If you don't get a rival challenge, go back to safe house and come back in free roam mode. When you get challenged, accept it and select any position on map to drive. This will slide and re-appear your car on other side of  the wall. Change your mode to free roam and drive to right carefully to road slowly watching that your car slides downward in dark area. (you can see video for the hint) Soon you will be driving your car out of your map. Driving underneath the city just follow the moon for direction also check map for directions Reach the destination marked in the picture.  Keep driving and you will soon see a road of canyon on your mini map.  Keep driving above the road and eventually you will fall down somewhere on the road. (While driving above the road in air, avoid slowing down your speed during this or you might get stuck in air. If you get stuck, try changing direction and or try reverse driving to come back in speed). Now you will be on the Canyon, which is not showing in the territory maps.
